name: Pinkpop

config_properties.name: Pinkpop
config_properties.description: The longest-running annual music festival in the Netherlands, held in Landgraaf since 1970.

ai_profile:
**Pinkpop 2026: A Celebration of Alternative Sounds and Global Talent**  

Pinkpop 2026 offers a vibrant lineup of 32 artists, showcasing a strong focus on alternative music genres. With Alternative Rock (8 acts) and Pop (7 acts) leading the charge, the festival also highlights a rich mix of Indie Rock, Electropop, Post-Punk, and more niche genres like Grunge and Rave Rock. The diversity of styles ensures something for every music lover, while the festival’s average artist rating of 6.88 reflects a solid roster of critically acclaimed performers.  

This year’s lineup is a global affair, featuring acts from eight countries. The United Kingdom and the United States dominate the roster with nine artists each, while the Netherlands proudly represents local talent with seven acts. Canada, Germany, and other nations contribute to the international flavor. Pinkpop 2026 also highlights a moderate gender diversity, with 8 female-led acts, 4 mixed-gender groups, and 20 male-led performances. However, representation of artists of color remains limited, with only one act identified in this category.  

Pinkpop continues its tradition of blending established names with up-and-coming talent, creating a platform for discovery while maintaining its alternative roots. With all 32 artists featured on Spotify, fans can easily explore and get acquainted with the lineup ahead of time. Pinkpop 2026 promises an eclectic and memorable experience, uniting music lovers through a shared passion for live music and genre-spanning artistry.
